content: Impress your audience with stunning slides.

comment.text: The "CreatePresentationDescription" translation key is used to describe a button that allows users to create a new presentation. The description will be displayed on a button or similar UI element, guiding users on what action it performs.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Impress your audience' is translated as '깊은 인상을 남기세요' (give a deep impression). While accurate, it lacks the immediacy and positive connotation of 'impress'. A more natural translation might convey excitement and impact.

The translation 'ඔබේ ප්‍රේක්ෂකයන් විශ්මියජනක ස්ලයිඩුවලින් වශී කරන්න' while conveying a similar sentiment, doesn't directly translate to 'Impress your audience with stunning slides.' The word ' වශී කරන්න' (vaashiya karanna) means 'to enchant' or 'to mesmerize,' which is a stronger term than 'impress'. A more accurate translation might focus on capturing the sense of 'impressing' or 'wowing' the audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ ප්‍රේක්ෂකයන් විශ්මිත ස්ලයිඩුවලින් වශී කරන්න (Obae prekshakayan vishmitha slaiduwalin vaashiya karanna) - This uses 'vishmitha' which conveys a sense of amazement/astonishment, closer to 'stunning'. A more literal and simpler alternative could be 'ඔබේ ප්‍රේක්ෂකයන් ආන්දෝलनීය ස්ලයිඩුවලින් ප්‍රමාණවත් කරන්න' (Obae prekshakayan aandaloniyo slaiduwalin pramaanavath karanna) - This uses 'aandaloniyo' meaning evocative/inspiring and 'pramaanavath karanna' meaning to satisfy/impress.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation focuses on *creating* an impression rather than simply *impressing* the audience. The English implies a presentation that already exists and will impress.  The Vietnamese suggests the user is building the presentation to impress.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ấn tượng người xem bằng những slide tuyệt đẹp.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the translation conveys the general meaning, '留下深刻印象' (liú xià shēn kè yìn xiàng) is a bit overly formal and strong for the simple 'Impress your audience'. A more natural and common phrasing would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 用精美的幻灯片吸引您的观众。
